item.title: California fires weather forecast: 'Dangerous' wind situation begins early Tuesday
item.description: The strongest gusts are expected Tuesday morning and early afternoon, which will then be followed by a break in the evening.

item.title: Human remains 'in various states of decomposition' found on public hiking trail
item.description: Human remains that had been decomposing “for an extended period of time” have been discovered just off of a public hiking trail in Utah, police said.

item.title: Jack Smith, in final report, says voters saved Trump from being convicted

item.title: WATCH: Cal Fire battalion chief speaks on battling the fires on the front lines

item.title: WATCH: Woman whose wedding ring was found in rubble after California fire shares her story
item.description: Victoria DeSantis' Altadena house was completely destroyed by the Eaton fire, but firefighters helped her uncover a symbol of hope amid the rubble.
